shop.title: Available Products We Have
shop.description1: We offer you a wide and abundant range of premium products
shop.description2: Just choose the category and browse its products

aboutUs.hero_title: We Help You Achieve Your Creative Goals!
aboutUs.hero_description: We understand the challenges that companies and individuals face when it comes to media production, advertising, and marketing. Our goal is to help you realize your creative vision by providing innovative and high-quality production solutions.
aboutUs.company_values: Ambition and commitment are our core values.
aboutUs.beginning_description: In 2012, Darb Production Company emerged in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, as a startup advertising company focusing on providing video production services to individuals and companies. Despite our humble beginnings, we prioritized quality and professionalism in every project we undertook, paving the way for our growth.
aboutUs.present_description: We are proud that at Darb we have achieved the impossible equation in our field, which is combining quality with speed of completion. This is the reason for our widespread reach. Our client page includes major companies in the region with whom we share long-term partnerships that we are proud of and keen to develop.
aboutUs.future_description_1: We seek to expand our client network and establish strategic alliances with companies in the Saudi and UAE markets
aboutUs.future_description_2: We seek to make a change in the Arab production industry to produce valuable Arab community content that plays a role in increasing community awareness by producing authentic Arab content that addresses Arab and global audiences and creates an impact on the recipient
aboutUs.future_description_3: We strive to be the most attractive work environment in the region in the production sector.
aboutUs.future_description_4: We seek to be closer to our clients by generalizing our experience in working with the business sector and transferring it to individuals.
aboutUs.about_description_1: A licensed and approved platform under the Islamic Crowdfunding Authority for Debt (P2P) that helps finance deferred sales invoices for small and medium enterprises in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
aboutUs.about_description_2: Our platform brings together thousands of financing seekers and trusted investors looking for new investment opportunities. Lendo's products and solutions make daily business activities faster, safer, and more efficient for both investors and financing seekers alike.
aboutUs.mission_title: We Contribute to Shaping a More Creative Future
aboutUs.help_companies_grow_description: At "Darb Productions", we believe that creativity is the true driver of growth. Through our innovative advertising and marketing solutions, we enable our clients to reach new markets and achieve their goals with steady and clear steps.
aboutUs.create_jobs_description: Since our launch in 2011, our team has been the secret of our excellence. We invest in expertise and encourage creativity, which gives us the ability to execute projects that contribute to creating job opportunities and enhancing the advertising sector in the region.
aboutUs.contribute_economy: We Contribute to Local Economic Development
aboutUs.contribute_economy_description: With our presence in Riyadh and Dubai, we work within an environment witnessing extensive renaissance. Through this, we contribute to stimulating innovation, supporting the creative economy, and providing real added value to everyone we work with, enhancing the region's position as a center for creativity and development.
aboutUs.message_paragraph_1: At Darb, our excellence is distinguished by values rooted in ambition and commitment, which is why we always strive to achieve rapid growth in various aspects of work
aboutUs.message_paragraph_2: With our offices located in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and in the shadow of the extensive renaissance they are witnessing and the ambition and successes that fill the region, we find ourselves surrounded by a positive environment that drives us to advance towards the future with confident steps. We focus on expansion and providing innovative solutions to become the best advertising and marketing company.
aboutUs.message_paragraph_3: Darb's strength lies in its team, which has proven decisively since 2011 until today that it is the decisive element in the company's success
aboutUs.message_paragraph_4: At Darb, we always focus on projects where we can be an added value. When any client chooses us, they guarantee that our accumulated expertise and passion for results are in their hands, and that our insistence on meeting deadlines while maintaining the quality of delivered work are principles we never abandon.
aboutUs.message_closing: I look forward to welcoming you to Darb Productions
aboutUs.vision_2030_title: In Line with Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030
aboutUs.vision_description_1: Improving the business environment, expanding the investment base, and providing job opportunities are among the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030.
aboutUs.vision_description_2: We believe in Saudi Arabia's business environment and aim to participate in achieving this goal by developing financing services and products that contribute to developing the business environment.
aboutUs.vision_description_3: Lendo platform seeks to be a partner in achieving this ambition, and launching our platform is our first step to participate in achieving a prosperous and independent economy.
aboutUs.board_description: Our board of directors includes a group of experts who have extensive experience and a deep commitment to achieving Lendo's goals.
aboutUs.investors_title: We Enjoy the Trust of Leading Investment Companies
aboutUs.investors_subtitle: Since its launch, Lendo has been able to attract investments worth more than $35 million USD
aboutUs.other_partners_info: And other partners who support our vision in developing the financing ecosystem in the Kingdom
